messages.title: Only Labour will stand up for us
messages.content: On policing – Doug Waddell, retired police detective: "Under the Tories, West Midlands has lost 1 in 5 police officers. The cuts are endangering us all. Labour's plan to put the frontline with 10,000 extra officers."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: "The Tories have allowed waiting lists to rise, let the NHS fall into a disgrace."
"The Tories are slashing winter fuel allowance"

issues.brexitEurope: We need a strong, independent-minded local MP who will stand up for our area, fight Brexit for jobs, businesses, and communities.
issues.health: The Tories have allowed waiting lists to rise, let the NHS fall into a disgrace.
issues.socialWelfare: The Tories are slashing winter fuel allowance

quotes.text: "As a World War II Army Veteran who fought for my country on the beaches of Normandy, I know what it means to fight for what you believe in."

images.caption: Gordon Horsewood, 9th Battalion Royal Tank Regiment veteran

The cuts are endangering us all.
